title: 神之火球 TNT已经弱爆了
author: 炸弹猴
txt_content:
本帖最后由 炸弹猴 于 2015-7-21 11:48 编辑 
本人第一次发教程废话不多说，直接进入教程。先来看看效果图——

这是建好后的                                                                   生成指令


/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~ ~1 ~ ~-24 ~1 redstone_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~2 ~ ~ ~-25 ~1 air},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon objectives add Fire dummy},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~-15 ~-1 {direction:[0.0,0.0,0.0],ExplosionPower:7}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard players add @e[type=Fireball] Fire @e[type=Fireball]},Time:1,}}}},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~6 ~-13 ~-1 quartz_block},Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:stone,Time:1}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}











刮开有惊喜【SB】
